nodes.text: Independent Movement for Self-Determination was an organization led by Count Dooku. It was mentioned in Count Dooku: Words of Truth, a propaganda poster to advertise a series of lectures that Count Dooku was supposed to give at Reena University. As part of the Self-Determination movement, Dooku toured universities and gave lectures. It gave him the legitimacy needed to become the leader of the Confederacy of Independent Systems years later.
